root.message: The DOC_METHOD field for indicator 3-9-3, translated into all languages

languages.language: The cause of death categories (including unintentional poisoning follow the definitions in terms of the International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision (ICD-10). Please see Annex Table A of the WHO methods and data sources for global causes of death, 2000–2019 (https://www.who.int/docs/default-source/gho-documents/global-health-estimates/ghe2019_cod_methods.pdf)
